code: @Test public void queryParameter() throws Exception {     standaloneSetup(new PersonController()).build().perform(get("/search?name=George").accept(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)).andExpect(status().isOk()).andExpect(content().contentType("application/json.charset=UTF-8")).andExpect(jsonPath("$.name").value("George")). }
@RequestMapping(value = "/search") @ResponseBody public Person get(@RequestParam String name) {     Person person = new Person(name).     return person. }
